DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and potential efficacy of deoxycholic acid injection compared to placebo for the reduction of submental fat (fat below the chin).
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1-2 Study of Deoxycholic Acid Injection (ATX-101) for the Reduction of Submental Fat
DOC.detailed_description: The trial included an initial cohort (3 participants in each arm) to evaluate safety followed by expansion to a second, larger cohort if adequate safety was determined in the initial cohort. Data from both cohorts was pooled for analysis.
DOC.criteria: Submental fat (SMF) that was considered undesirable by the subject and graded by the investigator as 2 or 3 using the SMF rating scale Good general health Signed informed consent History of any treatment in the neck or chin area Loose skin or prominent platysmal bands in the neck or chin area Recent treatment with anticoagulants Presence of clinically significant health problems
